topics.body:
So I just had a thought. You know how a lot of fantasy settings have giants?
And those giants are usually huge shitlords who just want to eat/maim/crush and generally fuck up humans.
What if instead of trying to kill us, giants that we were super cute? Like how we look at puppies and kittens is how they see us.
